post.text: Beautiful evening in Kinston, North Carolina - thank you! Get out and VOTE!! You can watch tonight's rally here below! LETS MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Alexandria
comment.text: just did a pole and said i was votting for trump 7500 pepole had voted and jhonson was ahead of clinton but 95 plus percent of the pepole had voted for trump! no one i know would vote for Hellery no one!!!! so how can the news outlets say she is leading its crazy and i live in WA Crazy if know one knows any one voting for her how can she be in the lead?????
